value.string:
selection
 selection_name=None
 selection_domain
 selection_report
 selection_params=""
 select_expression
 from_date=""
 at_date=""
 to_date=""
 node=""
 resource=""
 entity=""
 stat=""
 omit_input=""
 omit_output=""
 amount=""
 amount_range_min=""
 amount_range_max=""
 creation_date_range_min=""
 creation_date_range_max=""
 section_category=""
 count=""
 transaction_uid=""
 specific_reference
 no_limit
 search_result_keys=''
 delivery_mirror_section_title=""
 source_section_where_expression
 destination_section_where_expression

<dtml-let query="portal_catalog.buildSQLQuery(query=portal_catalog.getSecurityQuery(**selection_params), select_expression_key=('operation_date', 'specific_reference', 'delivery_mirror_section_title',), **selection_params)">
 <dtml-let search_result_keys="search_result_keys or portal_catalog.getCatalogSearchResultKeys()">
 <dtml-let use_movement_table="from_date or to_date or at_date or resource or stat or amount or amount_range_min or amount_range_max">
 
 
 <dtml-comment>
 #################################################
 # #
 # If both entity and section_category are NOT #
 # #
 #################################################
 </dtml-comment>
 <dtml-if "not (entity or section_category)">
 SELECT
 <dtml-if stat>
 SUM(stock.total_price) AS total_price
 <dtml-elif count>
 COUNT(DISTINCT catalog.uid) AS count
 <dtml-else>
 DISTINCT
 <dtml-in "search_result_keys">
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>,</dtml-unless>
 <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 , delivery.start_date as operation_date
 , 'source' as section_mark
 <dtml-if select_expression><dtml-var select_expression> </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 FROM
 <dtml-in prefix="table" expr="query['from_table_list']">
 <dtml-if "table_key not in ('delivery', 'catalog')">
 <dtml-var table_item> AS <dtml-var table_key>,
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">,
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report)">,
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table> movement, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "stat or omit_input or omit_output or node">
 stock, catalog as child,
 <dtml-unless section_category>category,</dtml-unless>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "section_category">category, catalog as section, </dtml-if>
 catalog,
 delivery
 
 WHERE
 delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if "query['where_expression']">
 AND <dtml-var "query['where_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report, strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if specific_reference> AND (
 catalog.source_reference LIKE
 <dtml-sqlvar specific_reference type="string">
 OR catalog.destination_reference LIKE
 <dtml-sqlvar specific_reference type="string"> )</dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction_uid>
 AND catalog.uid = <dtml-var transaction_uid> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) = <dtml-sqlvar amount type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_min>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) >= <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_min type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_max>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) < <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_max type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_min>
 AND catalog.creation_date >=
 <dtml-sqlvar creation_date_range_min type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_max>
 AND catalog.creation_date <
 <dtml-sqlvar "creation_date_range_max+1" type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table>
 AND movement.is_accountable
 AND movement.explanation_uid = catalog.uid </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource> AND movement.resource_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(resource).getUid()"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if entity> AND (
 delivery.destination_section_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(entity).getUid()">
 OR delivery.source_section_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(entity).getUid()">
 )</dtml-if>
 <dtml-if section_category> AND (
 ( category.uid = delivery.destination_section_uid
 ) OR ( category.uid = delivery.source_section_uid ) )
 AND section.portal_type = "Organisation"
 AND section.uid = category.uid
 AND category.category_uid =
 <dtml-var "portal_categories.restrictedTraverse(section_category).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-comment>
 -- FIXME: we want stop date when we are destination_section and start_date when
 -- we are source_section (one solution is to read in stock.date, but we try
 -- to avoid the use of stock table here)
 </dtml-comment>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND movement.start_date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND movement.start_date <= <dtml-sqlvar expr="to_date+1" type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND movement.start_date < <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if node>
 <dtml-if stat>
 AND stock.uid IN (
 SELECT child.uid from catalog as child
 WHERE category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 HAVING (SELECT count(stock.uid) from stock, catalog as child
 WHERE stock.uid = child.uid 
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 )
 )
 <dtml-else>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if stat>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if omit_input> AND stock.total_price < 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output> AND stock.total_price > 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if expr="selection_name is not None and portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeFor(selection_name) and len(portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeUidListFor(selection_name)) > 0">
 AND ( 0 = 1
 <dtml-in expr="portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeUidListFor(selection_name)">
 OR catalog.uid = <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-unless count>
 <dtml-if "query['order_by_expression']">
 ORDER BY <dtml-var "query['order_by_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "query['limit_expression']">
 LIMIT <dtml-var "query['limit_expression']">
 <dtml-else>
 <dtml-unless no_limit>LIMIT 1000</dtml-unless>
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-unless>
 
 </dtml-if>
 
 
 
 
 <dtml-comment>
 #################################################
 # #
 # If entity or section_category IS EXISTS #
 # #
 #################################################
 </dtml-comment>
 <dtml-if "entity or section_category">
 
 <dtml-if stat>
 SELECT SUM(total_price) AS total_price FROM (
 SELECT DISTINCT total_price, uid FROM (
 <dtml-elif count>
 SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT uid) AS count FROM (
 <dtml-else>
 SELECT catalog.*,
 <dtml-let accounting_movement_list="portal_url.getPortalObject().getPortalAccountingMovementTypeList()">
 ( SELECT SUM(stock.total_price) FROM stock, catalog AS child WHERE child.uid = stock.uid AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid AND stock.total_price > 0 AND <dtml-sqltest accounting_movement_list type=string column=child.portal_type op=eq multiple>) AS debit,
 ( SELECT -SUM(stock.total_price) FROM stock, catalog AS child WHERE child.uid = stock.uid AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid AND stock.total_price < 0 AND <dtml-sqltest accounting_movement_list type=string column=child.portal_type op=eq multiple>) AS credit
 FROM (
 </dtml-let>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-comment>
 ##################
 # #
 # Source Section #
 # #
 ##################
 </dtml-comment>
 
 (
 SELECT
 <dtml-if stat>
 stock.total_price, catalog.uid
 <dtml-elif count>
 catalog.uid
 <dtml-else>
 DISTINCT
 <dtml-in "search_result_keys">
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>,</dtml-unless>
 <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 , delivery.start_date as operation_date
 , 'source' as section_mark
 , catalog.source_reference as specific_reference
 <dtml-if "not (stat or count) and query['order_by_expression']">
 <dtml-let order_column="query['order_by_expression'].split(' ')[0]">
 <dtml-if "not order_column in ('operation_date', 'specific_reference')">
 ,<dtml-var "query['order_by_expression'].split(' ')[0]">
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-let>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if delivery_mirror_section_title>, mirror_section_catalog.title as delivery_mirror_section_title</dtml-if>
 <dtml-if select_expression><dtml-var select_expression> </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 FROM
 <dtml-in prefix="table" expr="query['from_table_list']">
 <dtml-if "table_key not in ('delivery', 'catalog')">
 <dtml-var table_item> AS <dtml-var table_key>,
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">,
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report)">,
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table> movement, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "stat or omit_input or omit_output or node">
 stock, catalog as child, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "section_category">category, catalog as section, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "delivery_mirror_section_title">delivery AS mirror_section_delivery, catalog AS mirror_section_catalog,</dtml-if>
 catalog,
 delivery
 
 WHERE
 delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if "query['where_expression']">
 AND <dtml-var "query['where_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if source_section_where_expression>
 AND <dtml-var source_section_where_expression>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report, strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if specific_reference>
 AND catalog.source_reference LIKE <dtml-sqlvar specific_reference type="string">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction_uid>
 AND catalog.uid = <dtml-var transaction_uid> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) = <dtml-sqlvar amount type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_min>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) >= <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_min type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_max>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) < <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_max type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_min>
 AND catalog.creation_date >=
 <dtml-sqlvar creation_date_range_min type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_max>
 AND catalog.creation_date <
 <dtml-sqlvar "creation_date_range_max+1" type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table>
 AND movement.is_accountable
 AND movement.explanation_uid = catalog.uid </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource> AND movement.resource_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(resource).getUid()"> </dtml-if>
 -- SOURCE SECTION!!!!!
 <dtml-if entity>
 AND delivery.source_section_uid =<dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(entity).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if section_category>
 AND category.uid = delivery.source_section_uid
 AND section.portal_type = "Organisation"
 AND section.uid = category.uid
 AND category.category_uid =
 <dtml-var "portal_categories.restrictedTraverse(section_category).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "delivery_mirror_section_title">
 AND mirror_section_catalog.uid = mirror_section_delivery.destination_section_uid
 AND mirror_section_delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 AND <dtml-sqltest delivery_mirror_section_title type=string op=like column=mirror_section_catalog.title>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-comment>
 -- FIXME: we want stop date when we are destination_section and start_date when
 -- we are source_section (one solution is to read in stock.date, but we try
 -- to avoid the use of stock table here)
 </dtml-comment>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND movement.start_date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND movement.start_date <= <dtml-sqlvar expr="to_date+1" type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND movement.start_date < <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if node>
 <dtml-if stat>
 AND stock.uid IN (
 SELECT child.uid from catalog as child
 WHERE category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 HAVING (SELECT count(stock.uid) from stock, catalog as child
 WHERE stock.uid = child.uid 
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 )
 )
 <dtml-else>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if stat>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if omit_input> AND stock.total_price < 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output> AND stock.total_price > 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if expr="selection_name is not None and portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeFor(selection_name) and len(portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeUidListFor(selection_name)) > 0">
 AND ( 0 = 1
 <dtml-in expr="portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeUidListFor(selection_name)">
 OR catalog.uid = <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 
 )
 
 
 
 UNION
 
 
 
 <dtml-comment>
 #######################
 # #
 # Destination Section #
 # #
 #######################
 </dtml-comment>
 
 (
 SELECT
 <dtml-if stat>
 stock.total_price, catalog.uid
 <dtml-elif count>
 catalog.uid
 <dtml-else>
 DISTINCT
 <dtml-in "search_result_keys">
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>,</dtml-unless>
 <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 , delivery.stop_date as operation_date
 , 'destination' as section_mark
 , catalog.destination_reference as specific_reference
 <dtml-if "not (stat or count) and query['order_by_expression']">
 <dtml-let order_column="query['order_by_expression'].split(' ')[0]">
 <dtml-if "not order_column in ('operation_date', 'specific_reference')">
 ,<dtml-var "query['order_by_expression'].split(' ')[0]">
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-let>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if delivery_mirror_section_title>, mirror_section_catalog.title as delivery_mirror_section_title</dtml-if>
 <dtml-if select_expression><dtml-var select_expression> </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 FROM
 <dtml-in prefix="table" expr="query['from_table_list']">
 <dtml-if "table_key not in ('delivery', 'catalog')">
 <dtml-var table_item> AS <dtml-var table_key>,
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">,
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report)">,
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table> movement, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "stat or omit_input or omit_output or node">
 stock, catalog as child, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "section_category">category, catalog as section, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "delivery_mirror_section_title">delivery AS mirror_section_delivery, catalog AS mirror_section_catalog,</dtml-if>
 catalog,
 delivery
 
 WHERE
 delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if "query['where_expression']">
 AND <dtml-var "query['where_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if destination_section_where_expression>
 AND <dtml-var destination_section_where_expression>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report, strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if specific_reference>
 AND catalog.destination_reference LIKE <dtml-sqlvar specific_reference type="string">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction_uid>
 AND catalog.uid = <dtml-var transaction_uid> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) = <dtml-sqlvar amount type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_min>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) >= <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_min type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_max>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) < <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_max type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_min>
 AND catalog.creation_date >=
 <dtml-sqlvar creation_date_range_min type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_max>
 AND catalog.creation_date <
 <dtml-sqlvar "creation_date_range_max+1" type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table>
 AND movement.is_accountable
 AND movement.explanation_uid = catalog.uid </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource> AND movement.resource_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(resource).getUid()"> </dtml-if>
 -- DESTINATION SECTION!!!!!
 <dtml-if entity>
 AND delivery.destination_section_uid = <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(entity).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if section_category>
 AND category.uid = delivery.destination_section_uid
 AND section.portal_type = "Organisation"
 AND section.uid = category.uid
 AND category.category_uid =
 <dtml-var "portal_categories.restrictedTraverse(section_category).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "delivery_mirror_section_title">
 AND mirror_section_catalog.uid = mirror_section_delivery.source_section_uid
 AND mirror_section_delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 AND <dtml-sqltest delivery_mirror_section_title type=string op=like column=mirror_section_catalog.title>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-comment>
 -- FIXME: we want stop date when we are destination_section and start_date when
 -- we are source_section (one solution is to read in stock.date, but we try
 -- to avoid the use of stock table here)
 </dtml-comment>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND movement.start_date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND movement.start_date <= <dtml-sqlvar expr="to_date+1" type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND movement.start_date < <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if node>
 <dtml-if stat>
 AND stock.uid IN (
 SELECT child.uid from catalog as child
 WHERE category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 HAVING (SELECT count(stock.uid) from stock, catalog as child
 WHERE stock.uid = child.uid 
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 )
 )
 <dtml-else>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if stat>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if omit_input> AND stock.total_price < 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output> AND stock.total_price > 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if expr="selection_name is not None and portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeFor(selection_name) and len(portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeUidListFor(selection_name)) > 0">
 AND ( 0 = 1
 <dtml-in expr="portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeUidListFor(selection_name)">
 OR catalog.uid = <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 )
 
 
 <dtml-comment>
 ##################
 # #
 # ORDER, LIMIT #
 # #
 ##################
 </dtml-comment>
 
 
 <dtml-if "count">
 ) as catalog
 <dtml-elif "stat">
 ) as sb
 ) as catalog
 <dtml-else>
 ) as catalog
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if "not (stat or count)">
 GROUP BY uid
 <dtml-if "query['order_by_expression']">
 ORDER BY <dtml-var "query['order_by_expression'].split('.')[-1]">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "query['limit_expression']">
 LIMIT <dtml-var "query['limit_expression']">
 <dtml-else>
 <dtml-unless no_limit>LIMIT 1000</dtml-unless>
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 </dtml-if>
 
 
 
 </dtml-let></dtml-let></dtml-let>
 
 <dtml-comment> vim: syntax=dtml
 </dtml-comment>

<dtml-let query="portal_catalog.buildSQLQuery(query=portal_catalog.getSecurityQuery(**selection_params), select_expression_key=('operation_date', 'specific_reference', 'delivery_mirror_section_title',), **selection_params)">
 <dtml-let search_result_keys="search_result_keys or portal_catalog.getCatalogSearchResultKeys()">
 <dtml-let use_movement_table="from_date or to_date or at_date or resource or stat or amount or amount_range_min or amount_range_max">
 
 
 <dtml-comment>
 #################################################
 # #
 # If both entity and section_category are NOT #
 # #
 #################################################
 </dtml-comment>
 <dtml-if "not (entity or section_category)">
 SELECT
 <dtml-if stat>
 SUM(stock.total_price) AS total_price
 <dtml-elif count>
 COUNT(DISTINCT catalog.uid) AS count
 <dtml-else>
 DISTINCT
 <dtml-in "search_result_keys">
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>,</dtml-unless>
 <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 , delivery.start_date as operation_date
 , 'source' as section_mark
 <dtml-if select_expression><dtml-var select_expression> </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 FROM
 <dtml-in prefix="table" expr="query['from_table_list']">
 <dtml-if "table_key not in ('delivery', 'catalog')">
 <dtml-var table_item> AS <dtml-var table_key>,
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">,
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report)">,
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table> movement, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "stat or omit_input or omit_output or node">
 stock, catalog as child,
 <dtml-unless section_category>category,</dtml-unless>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "section_category">category, catalog as section, </dtml-if>
 catalog,
 delivery
 
 WHERE
 delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if "query['where_expression']">
 AND <dtml-var "query['where_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report, strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if specific_reference> AND (
 catalog.source_reference LIKE
 <dtml-sqlvar specific_reference type="string">
 OR catalog.destination_reference LIKE
 <dtml-sqlvar specific_reference type="string"> )</dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction_uid>
 AND catalog.uid = <dtml-var transaction_uid> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) = <dtml-sqlvar amount type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_min>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) >= <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_min type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_max>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) < <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_max type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_min>
 AND catalog.creation_date >=
 <dtml-sqlvar creation_date_range_min type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_max>
 AND catalog.creation_date <
 <dtml-sqlvar "creation_date_range_max+1" type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table>
 AND movement.is_accountable
 AND movement.explanation_uid = catalog.uid </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource> AND movement.resource_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(resource).getUid()"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if entity> AND (
 delivery.destination_section_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(entity).getUid()">
 OR delivery.source_section_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(entity).getUid()">
 )</dtml-if>
 <dtml-if section_category> AND (
 ( category.uid = delivery.destination_section_uid
 ) OR ( category.uid = delivery.source_section_uid ) )
 AND section.portal_type = "Organisation"
 AND section.uid = category.uid
 AND category.category_uid =
 <dtml-var "portal_categories.restrictedTraverse(section_category).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-comment>
 -- FIXME: we want stop date when we are destination_section and start_date when
 -- we are source_section (one solution is to read in stock.date, but we try
 -- to avoid the use of stock table here)
 </dtml-comment>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND movement.start_date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND movement.start_date <= <dtml-sqlvar expr="to_date+1" type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND movement.start_date < <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if node>
 <dtml-if stat>
 AND stock.uid IN (
 SELECT child.uid from catalog as child
 WHERE category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 HAVING (SELECT count(stock.uid) from stock, catalog as child
 WHERE stock.uid = child.uid 
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 )
 )
 <dtml-else>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if stat>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if omit_input> AND stock.total_price < 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output> AND stock.total_price > 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if expr="selection_name is not None and portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeFor(selection_name) and len(portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeUidListFor(selection_name)) > 0">
 AND ( 0 = 1
 <dtml-in expr="portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeUidListFor(selection_name)">
 OR catalog.uid = <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-unless count>
 <dtml-if "query['order_by_expression']">
 ORDER BY <dtml-var "query['order_by_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "query['limit_expression']">
 LIMIT <dtml-var "query['limit_expression']">
 <dtml-else>
 <dtml-unless no_limit>LIMIT 1000</dtml-unless>
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-unless>
 
 </dtml-if>
 
 
 
 
 <dtml-comment>
 #################################################
 # #
 # If entity or section_category IS EXISTS #
 # #
 #################################################
 </dtml-comment>
 <dtml-if "entity or section_category">
 
 <dtml-if stat>
 SELECT SUM(total_price) AS total_price FROM (
 SELECT DISTINCT total_price, uid FROM (
 <dtml-elif count>
 SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT uid) AS count FROM (
 <dtml-else>
 SELECT catalog.*,
 <dtml-let accounting_movement_list="portal_url.getPortalObject().getPortalAccountingMovementTypeList()">
 ( SELECT SUM(stock.total_price) FROM stock, catalog AS child WHERE child.uid = stock.uid AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid AND stock.total_price > 0 AND <dtml-sqltest accounting_movement_list type=string column=child.portal_type op=eq multiple>) AS debit,
 ( SELECT -SUM(stock.total_price) FROM stock, catalog AS child WHERE child.uid = stock.uid AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid AND stock.total_price < 0 AND <dtml-sqltest accounting_movement_list type=string column=child.portal_type op=eq multiple>) AS credit
 FROM (
 </dtml-let>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-comment>
 ##################
 # #
 # Source Section #
 # #
 ##################
 </dtml-comment>
 
 (
 SELECT
 <dtml-if stat>
 stock.total_price, catalog.uid
 <dtml-elif count>
 catalog.uid
 <dtml-else>
 DISTINCT
 <dtml-in "search_result_keys">
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>,</dtml-unless>
 <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 , delivery.start_date as operation_date
 , 'source' as section_mark
 , catalog.source_reference as specific_reference
 <dtml-if "not (stat or count) and query['order_by_expression']">
 <dtml-let order_column="query['order_by_expression'].split(' ')[0]">
 <dtml-if "not order_column in ('operation_date', 'specific_reference')">
 ,<dtml-var "query['order_by_expression'].split(' ')[0]">
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-let>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if delivery_mirror_section_title>, mirror_section_catalog.title as delivery_mirror_section_title</dtml-if>
 <dtml-if select_expression><dtml-var select_expression> </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 FROM
 <dtml-in prefix="table" expr="query['from_table_list']">
 <dtml-if "table_key not in ('delivery', 'catalog')">
 <dtml-var table_item> AS <dtml-var table_key>,
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">,
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report)">,
 </dtml-if>

 <dtml-if "stat or omit_input or omit_output or node">
 stock, catalog as child, </dtml-if>

 <dtml-if "delivery_mirror_section_title">delivery AS mirror_section_delivery, catalog AS mirror_section_catalog,</dtml-if>
 catalog,
 delivery
 
 WHERE
 delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if "query['where_expression']">
 AND <dtml-var "query['where_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if source_section_where_expression>
 AND <dtml-var source_section_where_expression>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report, strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if specific_reference>
 AND catalog.source_reference LIKE <dtml-sqlvar specific_reference type="string">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction_uid>
 AND catalog.uid = <dtml-var transaction_uid> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) = <dtml-sqlvar amount type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_min>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) >= <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_min type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_max>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) < <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_max type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_min>
 AND catalog.creation_date >=
 <dtml-sqlvar creation_date_range_min type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_max>
 AND catalog.creation_date <
 <dtml-sqlvar "creation_date_range_max+1" type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table>
 AND movement.is_accountable
 AND movement.explanation_uid = catalog.uid </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource> AND movement.resource_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(resource).getUid()"> </dtml-if>
 -- SOURCE SECTION!!!!!
 <dtml-if entity>
 AND delivery.source_section_uid =<dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(entity).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if section_category>
 AND category.uid = delivery.source_section_uid
 AND section.portal_type = "Organisation"
 AND section.uid = category.uid
 AND category.category_uid =
 <dtml-var "portal_categories.restrictedTraverse(section_category).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "delivery_mirror_section_title">
 AND mirror_section_catalog.uid = mirror_section_delivery.destination_section_uid
 AND mirror_section_delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 AND <dtml-sqltest delivery_mirror_section_title type=string op=like column=mirror_section_catalog.title>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-comment>
 -- FIXME: we want stop date when we are destination_section and start_date when
 -- we are source_section (one solution is to read in stock.date, but we try
 -- to avoid the use of stock table here)
 </dtml-comment>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND movement.start_date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND movement.start_date <= <dtml-sqlvar expr="to_date+1" type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND movement.start_date < <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if node>
 <dtml-if stat>
 AND stock.uid IN (
 SELECT child.uid from catalog as child
 WHERE category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 HAVING (SELECT count(stock.uid) from stock, catalog as child
 WHERE stock.uid = child.uid 
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 )
 )
 <dtml-else>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if stat>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if omit_input> AND stock.total_price < 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output> AND stock.total_price > 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if expr="selection_name is not None and portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeFor(selection_name) and len(portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeUidListFor(selection_name)) > 0">
 AND ( 0 = 1
 <dtml-in expr="portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeUidListFor(selection_name)">
 OR catalog.uid = <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 
 )
 
 
 
 UNION
 
 
 
 <dtml-comment>
 #######################

 #######################
 </dtml-comment>
 
 (
 SELECT
 <dtml-if stat>
 stock.total_price, catalog.uid
 <dtml-elif count>
 catalog.uid
 <dtml-else>
 DISTINCT
 <dtml-in "search_result_keys">
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>,</dtml-unless>
 <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 , delivery.stop_date as operation_date
 , 'destination' as section_mark
 , catalog.destination_reference as specific_reference
 <dtml-if "not (stat or count) and query['order_by_expression']">

 ,<dtml-var "query['order_by_expression'].split(' ')[0]">

 </dtml-if>
 
 FROM
 <dtml-in prefix="table" expr="query['from_table_list']">
 <dtml-if "table_key not in ('delivery', 'catalog')">
 <dtml-var table_item> AS <dtml-var table_key>,
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>

 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table> movement, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "stat or omit_input or omit_output or node">
 stock, catalog as child, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "section_category">category, catalog as section, </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if "delivery_mirror_section_title">delivery AS mirror_section_delivery, catalog AS mirror_section_catalog,</dtml-if>
 catalog,
 delivery
 
 WHERE
 delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if "query['where_expression']">
 AND <dtml-var "query['where_expression']">
 </dtml-if>

 AND <dtml-var destination_section_where_expression>
 </dtml-if>

 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report, strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if specific_reference>
 AND catalog.destination_reference LIKE <dtml-sqlvar specific_reference type="string">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction_uid>
 AND catalog.uid = <dtml-var transaction_uid> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) = <dtml-sqlvar amount type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_min>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) >= <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_min type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if amount_range_max>
 AND ABS(movement.quantity) < <dtml-sqlvar amount_range_max type="float">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_min>
 AND catalog.creation_date >=
 <dtml-sqlvar creation_date_range_min type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if creation_date_range_max>
 AND catalog.creation_date <
 <dtml-sqlvar "creation_date_range_max+1" type="datetime"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if use_movement_table>
 AND movement.is_accountable
 AND movement.explanation_uid = catalog.uid </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource> AND movement.resource_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(resource).getUid()"> </dtml-if>
 -- DESTINATION SECTION!!!!!
 <dtml-if entity>
 AND delivery.destination_section_uid = <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(entity).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if section_category>
 AND category.uid = delivery.destination_section_uid
 AND section.portal_type = "Organisation"
 AND section.uid = category.uid
 AND category.category_uid =
 <dtml-var "portal_categories.restrictedTraverse(section_category).getUid()">

 <dtml-if "delivery_mirror_section_title">
 AND mirror_section_catalog.uid = mirror_section_delivery.source_section_uid
 AND mirror_section_delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 AND <dtml-sqltest delivery_mirror_section_title type=string op=like column=mirror_section_catalog.title>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-comment>
 -- FIXME: we want stop date when we are destination_section and start_date when
 -- we are source_section (one solution is to read in stock.date, but we try
 -- to avoid the use of stock table here)
 </dtml-comment>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND movement.start_date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>

 AND movement.start_date <= <dtml-sqlvar expr="to_date+1" type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>

 <dtml-if node>
 <dtml-if stat>
 AND stock.uid IN (
 SELECT child.uid from catalog as child
 WHERE category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 HAVING (SELECT count(stock.uid) from stock, catalog as child
 WHERE stock.uid = child.uid 
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )
 )
 )
 <dtml-else>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND (
 <dtml-in node>
 <dtml-unless sequence-start>OR</dtml-unless>
 stock.node_uid =
 <dtml-var "restrictedTraverse(_['sequence-item']).getUid()">
 </dtml-in> )

 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if stat>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if omit_input> AND stock.total_price < 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output> AND stock.total_price > 0
 AND stock.uid = movement.uid
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if expr="selection_name is not None and portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeFor(selection_name) and len(portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeUidListFor(selection_name)) > 0">
 AND ( 0 = 1
 <dtml-in expr="portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeUidListFor(selection_name)">
 OR catalog.uid = <dtml-var sequence-item>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 )

 <dtml-if "count">
 ) as catalog
 <dtml-elif "stat">

 <dtml-if "not (stat or count)">
 GROUP BY uid
